from 11% to 13% market share. "Their new products just came out and are beginning to get traction," said Van Conway, CEO of Conway McKenzie, a Detroit-based turnaround consultant. Coupled with expectations that North American sales volumes will grow by at least 1 million vehicles, they could easily generate closer to$ 2 billion in cash. The fact that Sergio Marchionne firmly defended the decision to pay hourly and salaried workers "performance awards" for the 2010 results indicates his confidence that the operating improvements will outpace the debt payments eventually.
